languages.text: "Ваша задача — безукоризненно исполнять свой долг и докладывать каждый свой шаг мне. Не посрамите блюстителей, иначе будете держать ответ передо мной лично".
"You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."
languages.original_text: "Ваша задача — безукоризненно исполнять свой долг и докладывать каждый свой шаг мне. Не посрамите блюстителей, иначе будете держать ответ передо мной лично".

traits.locale_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should your actions bring shame to the enforcer corps, you will have to answer to me personally."
"You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should your actions bring shame to the enforcer corps, you will have to answer to me personally."
"You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcer corps, you will answer to me personally."
"You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcer corps, you will answer to me personally."
"You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."
"You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."

languages.text: « J'attends de vous une conduite exemplaire et un rapport circonstancié à chaque étape de l'investigation. Si, par vos agissements, vous jetez le discrédit sur les prévôts, vous devrez m'en répondre personnellement. »
languages.original_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."

traits.locale_text: « J'attends de vous une conduite exemplaire et un rapport circonstancié à chaque étape de l'investigation. Si, par vos agissements, vous jetez le discrédit sur les prévôts, vous devrez m'en répondre personnellement. »

languages.text: «Espero que realicen sus tareas a la perfección y que me informen de cada paso que tomen. Si alguno de sus actos deshonra al personal de seguridad, responderán ante mí personalmente».
languages.original_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que realicen sus tareas a la perfección y que me informen de cada paso que tomen. Si alguno de sus actos deshonra al personal de seguridad, responderán ante mí personalmente».

languages.text: “我希望所有人都能一丝不苟地履行职责，无论做了什么都要向我汇报。如果有谁敢让我们执法者蒙辱的话，我唯他是问。”
languages.original_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."

traits.locale_text: “我希望所有人都能一丝不苟地履行职责，无论做了什么都要向我汇报。如果有谁敢让我们执法者蒙辱的话，我唯他是问。”

languages.text: 「職務を完璧に遂行し、その逐一を私に報告するんだ。万が一、エンフォーサーに恥をかかせるようなことがあれば、私に直接報告するように」
languages.original_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."

traits.locale_text: 「職務を完璧に遂行し、その逐一を私に報告するんだ。万が一、エンフォーサーに恥をかかせるようなことがあれば、私に直接報告するように」

languages.text: "Es wird von Euch erwartet, dass Ihr Eure Pflicht makellos erfüllt und mir über jeden Schritt Bericht erstattet. Sollte Euer Verhalten Schande über die Enforcers bringen, werdet Ihr mir persönlich Rede und Antwort stehen."
languages.original_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."

traits.locale_text: "Es wird von Euch erwartet, dass Ihr Eure Pflicht makellos erfüllt und mir über jeden Schritt Bericht erstattet. Sollte Euer Verhalten Schande über die Enforcers bringen, werdet Ihr mir persönlich Rede und Antwort stehen."

languages.text: "Vazifelerini kusursuz bir şekilde yerine getirip her bir adımı bana bildirmeni bekliyorum. Herhangi bir eylemin infazcıların namına gölge düşürürse bizzat bana hesap vereceksin."
languages.original_text: "You are expected to perform your duties immaculately and report your every step to me. Should any of your actions bring shame to the enforcers, you will answer to me personally."
